entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
